---
title: "Summary of variables"
date: '`r strftime(Sys.time())`'
output: 
  pdf_document
    
---
  
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Example
```{r example, echo=FALSE}
r <- potteR::get_summary(data)

t <- purrr::map2(
  r, names(r), 
  function(x, y){
    knitr::kable(x, caption = paste(y))
    }
  )
print(r)

```
